attributes.action: Make balaclavas and face coverings in public illegal.
attributes.additional_details: Because identity of criminals could be hiding behind the mask or anyone, it might also hide the identity of a criminal or person that has commited a first crime or someone breaking the law actively...
attributes.background: Ban them. Make them a criminal offence in public. for no apparent reason.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Prohibit the wearing of all full-face coverings in public spaces
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/723131
